response.content: Marta leans in, lowering her voice. "Most of the merchants are friendly enough, but the big trader in the market—Gorim the Clothier—has been cutting corners lately. If you need a good deal, avoid the back alleys; he’s been skirting the town’s rules."

a625875e7d07cd119ee40ad27eec962949b2270a.request_summary: sys:You are roleplaying as an NPC ... | msg:The player character says to d... | tools:11

response.content: Marta Hearthwood smiles, wiping a mug with a rag. "The village lies to the east, past the river—just a day's walk. Care to hear about the troubles the farmers have been facing lately?"
